products.name: Fitbit Charge Fitness Tracker (FB404BKL-CAN) - Large - Black
products.shortDescription: Setting fitness goals is one thing, but staying motivated poses a bigger challenge. With the Fitbit Charge wristband tracker, you don't have to worry about the details. It monitors activity like steps taken, calories burned and active minutes, as well as sleep duration and quality. The comfy, textured band is designed for continuous wear.

products.name: Misfit Flash Wireless Activity & Sleep Tracker - Onyx
products.shortDescription: Get fit and stay motivated no matter what you're doing during the day with the Misfit Flash. It measures a wide variety of activities, from walking to sports, as well as sleep, and syncs with your smartphone so you can see the big fitness picture. With 30-metre waterproofing, this handy device can tag along while you're swimming or running outdoors.

products.name: Motorola Moto 360 Smartwatch (00526NACRTL) - Black
products.shortDescription: It is the future of watches but also in keeping with the classics, the Moto 360 will astonish you with the innovative features and technologies as it walks the runway with its sleek lines bold colours. Sync with your Android smartphone and your world will become a simple turn of your wrist.

products.name: Samsung Gear S Smartwatch - Medium - Black
products.shortDescription: On-the-go individuals will benefit from the Gear S from Samsung. It combines style and function to deliver a mobile experience that's designed to accommodate your active lifestyle with features such as a heart rate monitor, WiFi connectivity, and a tracker that keeps you updated with every step you take.

products.name: Fitbit Charge Fitness Tracker (FB404SLL-CAN) - Large - Slate
products.shortDescription: Setting fitness goals is one thing, but staying motivated poses a bigger challenge. With the Fitbit Charge wristband tracker, you don't have to worry about the details. It monitors activity like steps taken, calories burned and active minutes, as well as sleep duration and quality. The comfy, textured band is designed for continuous wear.

products.name: Fitbit Charge HR Fitness Tracker (FB405BKS-CAN) - Small - Black
products.shortDescription: Setting fitness goals is one thing, but staying motivated poses a bigger challenge. With the Fitbit Charge HR wristband tracker, you don't have to worry about the details. It automatically monitors heart rate without cumbersome chest straps as well as activity all day and night, so you can accurately track real-time stats and measure your progress.

products.name: Fitbit Flex Wireless Activity & Sleep Wristband (FB401BK) - Black
products.shortDescription: A perfect fitness partner, Fitbit Flex helps you stay motivated by tracking your steps, distance and calories burned. Set a goal and Flex's LED lights will tell you how you're doing. Flex also monitors your sleep patterns and wakes you with its silent alarm. It automatically syncs stats to your computer, smartphone or tablet, making it easy to see your progress and stay on top of your goals.

products.name: Fitbit Charge HR Fitness Tracker (FB405BKL-CAN) - Large - Black
products.shortDescription: Setting fitness goals is one thing, but staying motivated poses a bigger challenge. With the Fitbit Charge HR wristband tracker, you don't have to worry about the details. It automatically monitors heart rate without cumbersome chest straps as well as activity all day and night, so you can accurately track real-time stats and measure your progress.

products.name: Fitbit Surge Fitness Tracker with GPS (FB501BKL-CAN) - Large - Black
products.shortDescription: Setting fitness goals is one thing, but staying motivated poses a bigger challenge. With the Fitbit Surge Fitness Tracker, you don't have to worry about the details. Built-in GPS and automatic, continuous heart rate monitoring ensure your real-time stats are accurate. Train smarter whether running, cross-training, biking and more.

products.name: Razer Nabu Wireless Activity & Sleep Tracker - Large - Black
products.shortDescription: Bring convenience to your fitness routine with the Razer Nabu. It logs activity data, allows you to receive your smartphone's notifications right to your wrist, and serves as an open platform for third-party applications.

products.name: Fitbit Charge Fitness Tracker (FB404BKS-CAN) - Small - Black
products.shortDescription: Setting fitness goals is one thing, but staying motivated poses a bigger challenge. With the Fitbit Charge wristband tracker, you don't have to worry about the details. It monitors activity like steps taken, calories burned and active minutes, as well as sleep duration and quality. The comfy, textured band is designed for continuous wear.

products.name: Misfit Shine Activity & Sleep Tracker with Bloom Necklace - Topaz
products.shortDescription: Stay motivated and maintain a healthy lifestyle with this Misfit Shine activity tracker. It tracks your daily activity with a halo of lights that will help you set your everyday goals, and your sleep patterns to ensure you're getting the rest you need so you can be up and at ‘em the following day.

products.name: Runtastic Orbit Activity & Sleep Tracker - Blue/Black
products.shortDescription: Stay on top of your health and fitness goals with the Runtastic Orbit. This activity and sleep tracker keeps current stats on the distances you've trekked, calories you've consumed, and hours you've slept, syncing your info to your smartphone to keep you informed and motivated.

products.name: TomTom Runner GPS Watch - Dark Grey
products.shortDescription: Know exactly where you are and where you need to go with the TomTom Runner GPS Watch. It makes a great training partner with at-a-glance views of your running stats and built-in QuickGPSFix for finding your precise location. The included heart rate monitor helps you better track your workout intensity.

products.name: Pebble Steel Smartwatch (401BLR) - Black
products.shortDescription: Stop fumbling around for your phone to see who's calling or texting. The Pebble smartwatch pairs with your compatible Apple or Android device so you can view notifications, control your tunes and more, right from your wrist. With a waterproof design and easy-to-read e-paper display, Pebble can keep up with a busy, active lifestyle. Please Note: Steel Strap is sold seperately.

products.name: Fitbit Charge Fitness Tracker (FB404SLS-CAN) - Small - Slate
products.shortDescription: Keep track of your fitness progress with the Fitbit Flex and prepare to be amazed at what you are capable of. Set up your goals and the Flex will tell you how you're doing every step of the way. It even monitors your sleep patterns so you can improve the quality of your rest to keep up with your new and healthy lifestyle.

products.name: Samsung Gear Live Smartwatch (SM-R3820ZKAXAC) - Black
products.shortDescription: The Samsung Gear Live smartwatch brings you up to speed on your digital life with just a glance. Paired with a smart device, it can display time, various email, calendar and social media notifications, and real-time progress on your activities throughout the day. Built-in sensors monitor heart rate, calories burned, steps taken and more.

products.shortDescription: Setting fitness goals is one thing, but staying motivated poses a bigger challenge. With the Fitbit Surge Fitness Tracker, you don't have to worry about the details. products.name: Pebble Steel Smartwatch (401SLR) - Silver
products.shortDescription: More than a watch, the Pebble steel smartwatch keeps you up to date on your digital life. With Bluetooth technology, you can pair with select Apple and Android devices so you can see notifications at a glance, track your activities and more. The E-paper display ensures you get a clear view even in sunlight. Please Note: Steel Strap is sold separately.

products.name: Fitbit Flex Wireless Activity & Sleep Wristband (FB401TE-CAN) - Teal
products.shortDescription: The Fitbit Flex is a sleek and lightweight device that enables you to track your steps, distance, and calories burned to keep you on target of your fitness goals. It even monitors your sleep, and wakes you up with an alarm. Plus, you can access your stats wirelessly through your computer and select mobile devices.

products.name: Garmin Vívosmart Wireless Activity & Sleep Tracker - Large - Slate/Black
products.shortDescription: Take a smart approach to fitness with Garmin vivosmart. This wearable activity tracker measures your steps taken, calories burned, distance travelled, and sleep patterns to give a better picture of your activity levels. It pairs with your compatible Bluetooth device and sends you notifications when you get calls, texts, or emails.

products.name: Misfit Shine Activity Tracker (SH0AZ) - Grey
products.shortDescription: The Misfit Shine Activity Monitor helps you track your overall health by measuring your activity level, calories burned, how well you sleep and more. It features a jewelry-like appearance and durable aluminum design that's great for long-term, every day wear. Designed for a variety of activities, this monitor is also water-resistant up to 164'.

products.name: Misfit Flash Wireless Activity & Sleep Tracker - Frost
products.shortDescription: Get fit and stay motivated no matter what you're doing during the day with the Misfit Flash. It measures a wide variety of activities, from walking to sports, as well as sleep, and syncs with your smartphone so you can see the big fitness picture. With 30-metre waterproofing, this handy device can tag along while you're swimming or running outdoors.

products.name: Striiv FUSION Smartwatch - Black
products.shortDescription: Keeping track of your health has never been easier. The Striiv Fusion smartwatch features a 24/7 activity tracker that records number of steps, distance travelled, and calories burned. It also has a sleep quality tracker to help you get the best night's rest. Connect to your smartphone, iOS or Android, through Bluetooth using the Striiv app.

products.name: Pebble Smartwatch (301BL) - Black
products.shortDescription: With the Pebble smartwatch, you don't need to fumble around for your phone to see who's calling or texting. This smartwatch pairs with your compatible Apple or Android device, so you can view notifications, control your tunes and much more, right from your wrist. With a waterproof design and easy-to-read e-paper display, Pebble can keep up with a busy, active lifestyle.

products.name: Misfit Flash Wireless Activity & Sleep Tracker - Fuchsia
products.shortDescription: Get fit and stay motivated no matter what you're doing during the day with the Misfit Flash. products.name: Basis Peak Fitness & Sleep Tracker - Black
products.shortDescription: Stay focused on your daily goals with the Peak fitness and sleep tracker from Basis. It tracks your heart rate all day and night using a wrist-based optical blood flow engine, eliminating the need to strap on a chest sensor. Monitor your activity, like running, walking and biking, as well as sleep cycles.

products.name: Jawbone UP24 Activity Tracker - Small - Onyx
products.shortDescription: Track your sleeping, eating and movement patterns with the stylish and water-resistant Jawbone UP24 wristband. Get motivated to make better choices and improvements with real-time updates, insights and notifications to keep you true to your goals.

products.name: Samsung Gear 2 Smartwatch (SM-R3800VSAXAC) - Black
products.shortDescription: Extend your mobile experience beyond your smartphone by expanding into wearable technology. With the Samsung Gear 2 smartwatch strapped to your wrist, you are set up to take calls and photos, track workouts, and get notifications for everything from emails to social networking events, even when your phone is tucked away elsewhere.
